statements.query: MATCH (trail:AWSCloudTrailTrail)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE EXISTS(trail.exposed_internet) WITH trail LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE REMOVE trail.exposed_internet, trail.exposed_internet_type return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (bucket:S3Bucket{anonymous_access: true})-[:HAS_BUCKET]-(trail:AWSCloudTrailTrail)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WITH trail, bucket WHERE (NOT EXISTS(trail.anonymous_access_type)) OR (NOT 'public_bucket' IN trail.anonymous_access_type) SET trail.anonymous_access = true, trail.anonymous_access_type = coalesce(trail.anonymous_access_type , []) + 'public_bucket', trail.anonymous_actions = bucket.anonymous_actions;
